## Esna 288 {-}

- Location: Column 10
- Date: Domitian 
- [Hieroglyphic Text](https://www.ifao.egnet.net/uploads/publications/enligne/Temples-Esna003.pdf#page=244){target="_blank"}  
- Bibliography: @sauneron-5, p. 138.

<div class="col2">  

^18^ *mzỉ dqr.w nt šȝ.w nb.w  *  
*ḏd-mdw  *  
   
*mȝʿ wʿb n kȝ-k  *  
*ẖnmw-Rʿ nb tȝ-sn.t  *  
*m dqr.w nb bnr   *  
*[...]  *  
    
*[...]* ^19^ *ỉr.n=k  *  
*m rn=k pfy  *  
*n ỉr wnn.t  *

^18^ Offering fruits of all plants.  
Words spoken:  
   
A pure offering for your Ka,  
Khnum-Re Lord of Esna,[^fn-288-1]  
of all sweet fruits  
[...]  
  
[...] ^19^ which you made,  
in this your name  
of He who Made what Exists.  

</div>

[^fn-288-1]: ![](./images/288_18.png){width=17%} - The final *n* is likely derived from *npry*, "grain": @sauneron-8, p. 158. Similar signs dots determine the word *dqr.w*, "fruits" in the present text.
